Habit Module¶

class habit.Habit(name, description, periodicity, id=None, creation_date=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Represents a habit to be tracked.

id¶

Unique identifier for the habit.

Type:

int

name¶

Name of the habit.

Type:

str

description¶

Detailed description of the habit.

Type:

str

periodicity¶

Frequency of the habit (‘daily’ or ‘weekly’).

Type:

str

creation_date¶

Date and time when the habit was created.

Type:

datetime

completed_dates¶

List of datetime objects representing completion dates.

Type:

list

complete_task()[source]¶

Mark the habit as completed for the current date and time.

get_current_streak()[source]¶

Calculate the current streak of completed habits.

Returns:

The number of consecutive times the habit has been completed.

Return type:

int

is_task_completed()[source]¶

Check if the habit has been completed within its periodicity.

Returns:

True if the habit is completed within its periodicity, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool
